topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5555433f636872329e971700#post_5555433f636872329e971700

Speaking of Paranoia Agent; for those of you that haven't watched Paranoia Agent I would suggest watching it.

Even today it still stands up; most anime after a decade or so they don't age well story wise and you start to notice that nostalgia is making you gloss over the stupid parts, but Paranoia Agent is one of those ones that when it was created it was pretty good and is still pretty good even without the nostalgia factor.

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/555546a36368724cbc850600#post_555546a36368724cbc850600
[bq="trashboat"]Speaking of Medabots. Why do all of the kids have robots that can smash concrete and steel?[/bq]
If you watch the ending it'll make sense.

Massive spoiler:
[spoiler]
The reason why technology is so advanced while being set in a semi-modern era is that medabots originally destroyed civilization, but it was so long ago that the conspiracy to keep it secret is even gone.  People think they're just toys because for as long as society remembers medabots have always been "just toys" when it's all a conspiracy to have children accept the medabots so that the medabots will learn sympathy and emotionally attach to humans.
[/spoiler]

topics.author: 31bee2686368722a0df23600

topics.body:
Morning.

I think I'm going insane. 
Imaginary girls are appearing in my dreams when I'm asleep and they're actually talkative and nice to me in a non-annoying manner. They also follow me around and talk to me and not think I'm weird or anything.

And I also act a whole lot different than in real life when wearing something on my face. Like a mask that amplifies my true feelings and self.

What the fuck is going on?!
